description: Tax disc is a service within vehicle licensing, which also covers SORN (Statutory Off Road Notification). This service is provided by the DVLA to relicense vehicles that are kept on public roads. This service does not include first vehicle registrations.

modules.title: Applications breakdown
modules.description: Tax disc applications per month broken into digital, Post Office and DVLA centre applications
info: Shows the number of successful applications to renew a tax disc, broken into digital, Post Office and DVLA centre applications
Digital and automated phone: applications made online or using the automated telephone service
Post Office: applications made at a Post Office branch
DVLA centre: applications made at local DVLA centres

modules.title: Service availability
info: Page load time measures the time taken for a sample page within the service to load.
Uptime measures the percentage of time that the service was observed to be available.
